markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Azata](/Traits.aspx?ID=17)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This family of [celestials](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) is native to [Elysium](/Planes.aspx?ID=16). They are typically chaotic good and have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) and a weakness to evil and [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375).
name: Azata
